main event: An unidentified object was sighted at Wheelus AB, Tripoli, Libya, on December 2, 1960, leaving a trail of flame and exhibiting unusual flight characteristics.
interesting points: The object was reported to have brightened to high intensity and then dimmed, indicating unorthodox flight characteristics.,The sighting duration was approximately 30 seconds.,The object was described as larger and slower than a shooting star.,The sighting was made during a visual weather observation.,There were clear weather conditions at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: a bright ball with a flaming trail
